channel.title: Help
channel.description: Ok... i want to know how to like make the shop pop up when u click on the npc it's an npc that i added btw it wasn't already part of one of the shop npcs... but i added it to spawn.cfg or w/e and also to the other files and folders where i typed the case and everything and i also added it to shops too... but when i click it it doesnt do anything.... oh and i also need to know how to make it so that the items in the hops actually let u buy em and show a price when u value... instead of "0 points" please help... [b][u][i]p.s: dont reply telling me how to add the npc, add the shop, add the items to the shop i know how to do that stuff... i've done it... but idk how to make the items cost anything in the shop and in the completly new npc i added his shop doesnt even come up when i talk to him thats what i need help with... not adding the npc nor the shop...P.S.S:IF U REPLY WITH ANY BS LIKE "it's in blah blah blah folder, figure it out for urself.." YOUR COMMENT WILL BE IGNORED.. I'VE ALREADY TRIED THIS ON MY OWN SO DONT GIVE ME THE DAMN "I DONT SPOONFEED FIGURE IT OUT ON UR OWN" BS I READ THE RULES AND THEY STATE THIS SECTION DOESNT SPOONFEED UNLESS U TRY FIRST WHICH I HAVE... SO PLEASE HELP ME[/i][/u][/b]

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:15, topic:417893”]Wow dude. This is why no one wants to help you. Some one tries to help you and you dont even know how to Copy, Ctrl + F, Paste and enter. Sad bro.

Actionhandler.java

case npcid: c.getShops.openShop(); break;[/quote]
He’s right.

Read full topic

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Wow dude. This is why no one wants to help you. Some one tries to help you and you dont even know how to Copy, Ctrl + F, Paste and enter. Sad bro.

Actionhandler.java

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

If this is for PI, in wich i’m going to assume it is, there is a firstClickNpc. I won’t spoonfeed you but I will try to help you with the problem. In order to have a shop ‘pop-up’ from clicking on that NPC you must have a shop created and have it underneath firstClickNpc. Use the search bar.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @whogoesthere whogoesthere
item.description:
@whogoesthere wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:12, topic:417893”][quote author=whogoesthere link=topic=520441.msg3779811#msg3779811 date=1318370272]1.I’m not being a dick(at least I’m not trying to be)
2. I’m pissed and tired of not being able to get the help i need to finish my server cuz of all the dicks in the server help section being assholes
3.I know you’re trying to help
4. I didn’t do the steps wrong that you told me
[/quote]
You need to put a new case under firstClickNpc. You should get it from there.[/quote]WTF are you talking about? There is no “firstclicknpc”

Read full topic

You need to put a new case under firstClickNpc. You should get it from there.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @ppvagina ppvagina
item.description:
@ppvagina wrote:

this is how mine is in actionhandler. java

			case npcid:
			c.getShops().openShop(shop#);
		break;

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @whogoesthere whogoesthere
item.description:
@whogoesthere wrote:

Ok… i want to know how to like make the shop pop up when u click on the npc it’s an npc that i added btw it wasn’t already part of one of the shop npcs… but i added it to spawn.cfg or w/e and also to the other files and folders where i typed the case and everything and i also added it to shops too… but when i click it it doesnt do anything… oh and i also need to know how to make it so that the items in the hops actually let u buy em and show a price when u value… instead of “0 points” please help…
p.s: dont reply telling me how to add the npc, add the shop, add the items to the shop i know how to do that stuff… i’ve done it… but idk how to make the items cost anything in the shop and in the completly new npc i added his shop doesnt even come up when i talk to him thats what i need help with… not adding the npc nor the shop…P.S.S:IF U REPLY WITH ANY BS LIKE “it’s in blah blah blah folder, figure it out for urself…” YOUR COMMENT WILL BE IGNORED… I’VE ALREADY TRIED THIS ON MY OWN SO DONT GIVE ME THE DAMN “I DONT SPOONFEED FIGURE IT OUT ON UR OWN” BS I READ THE RULES AND THEY STATE THIS SECTION DOESNT SPOONFEED UNLESS U TRY FIRST WHICH I HAVE… SO PLEASE HELP ME

Read full topic
